General.Name: Radiant Opto-Electronics Corp
General.Description: Radiant Opto-Electronics Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of backlight panels and lighting components for liquid crystal display (LCD) panels in Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company's products are used in various applications, including smartphones, DSC, video phones, tablets, notebooks, dashboards, pocket TVs, DVD players, car navigations, monitors, all in one PCs, and TFT LCD TVs. Radiant Opto-Electronics Corporation was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
